description: This course will shed light on the current massive trends in business marketing that include social media and specifically Facebook. It will show you why it is so crucial that you embrace this trend and take immediate action. Most of this course is over the shoulder video showing you exactly how to set up an effective Facebook presence for your business as well as the basics on setting up an advertising account and running paid ads to grow your business. This course includes approximately 2 1/2+ hours of tutorials.
title: Facebook Basics For Business
